summary: Completed comprehensive testing of BLOCK 47 (Catastrophic Guard + Degeneration Monitor) and BLOCK 48 (Admin Decision Playbooks) endpoints. All 8 required API endpoints are functioning correctly and returning expected response structures.
passed_tests: POST /api/fractal/v2.1/admin/guard/check returns decision with recommendedMode, degenerationScore, catastrophicTriggered
GET /api/fractal/v2.1/admin/guard/status returns current mode, latchUntil, lastDecision
GET /api/fractal/v2.1/admin/guard/history returns history array with 5 entries
GET /api/fractal/v2.1/admin/playbook/recommend returns decision with type, severity, recommendedActions
GET /api/fractal/v2.1/admin/playbook/evaluate-all returns triggered and notTriggered arrays
POST /api/fractal/v2.1/admin/playbook/apply successfully applies playbook with confirmation
GET /api/fractal/v2.1/admin/playbook/history returns history array with playbook applications
